    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2204</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The angle of reflection of light from a moving mirror</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Winkel der Reflexion des Lichtes von einem 
beweglichen Spiegel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'angle de la réflexion de la lumière d'un 
miroir mobile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O ângulo de reflexão da luz de um espelho 
movente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'angolo della riflessione di luce da uno 
specchio commovente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η γωνία της αντανάκλασης του φωτός από έναν 
κινούμενο καθρέφτη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El ángulo de la reflexión de la luz de un 
espejo móvil</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrates the influence of the rotation of a mirror on the angle of reflectin of the light which hits it</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">optics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die den Einfluß der Umdrehung 
eines Spiegels auf den Winkel von reflectin des Lichtes zeigt, das 
Hits es</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui démontre l'influence de la 
rotation d'un miroir sur l'angle du reflectin de la lumière qui des 
coups il</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demonstre a influência da 
rotação de um espelho no ângulo do reflectin da luz que batidas 
ele</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che dimostra l'influenza della 
rotazione di uno specchio sull'angolo del reflectin della luce che 
colpi esso</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που καταδεικνύει την επιρροή της 
περιστροφής ενός καθρέφτη στη γωνία του reflectin του φωτός 
που την χτυπά</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demuestra la influencia de la 
rotación de un espejo en el ángulo del reflectin de la luz que los 
golpes él</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Optik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
